      • setPoint

        private void setPoint(java.lang.String point,
            double pointValueN,
            double pointValueE)
        a method that assigns point values to an array for those point values, it takes input to select which point is to be assigned the values
        Parameters:
        point - a string input that is used to select whether the value is assigned to point 1 or 2
        pointValueN - north value in meters to be assigned to the north (x) coordinate of the array
        pointValueE - east value in meters to be assigned to the east (y) coordinate of the array

      • getDistance

        private double getDistance(double[] pointA,
                 double[] pointB)
        a method that returns the distance between two points on an xy coordinate grid
        Parameters:
        pointA - the first point that is entered
        pointB - the second point that is entered
        Returns:
        the distance between point A and B

      • getHeading

        private double getHeading(double[] pointA,
                double[] pointB)
        a method that returns the heading in degrees from a given point (point A)
        Parameters:
        pointA - origin point for heading
        pointB - point that derives the heading
        Returns:
        heading in degrees from north

      • intitializeOptionsList

        private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> intitializeOptionsList()
        a method than creates an arrayList of values
        Returns:
        arraylist containing the options for the initial input of values

      • outputPoint

        private java.lang.String outputPoint(double[] point)
        a method that returns a point array neatly for output to a user
        Parameters:
        point - array that contains the two coordinates of the point
        Returns:
        a String of the cleaned point
